name: Roomies
description:
Game developed in 48H during the Ludum Dare 37.

The Theme of the Game Jam: One Room

This is a Rogue-like Room management.

Every cycle you might have the chance to get a new furniture, new roomies or maybe even to trash one of your hold crappy furniture.

LD37 Submission page: http://ludumdare.com/compo/ludum-dare-37/?action=preview&uid=25664

version 1.0 (11.12.2017)

- Initial submission for LD37

version 1.1 (02.02.2017)

- Improved AI (they tend to pick activities that have low stats)

- Improved balancing

- Fullscreen mode
